Text: Many thanx. TW is great and so is FLAC. I wish more people would upload music in FLAC.

Yes vinylking - flac is great. But I often have to recode to mp3 depending on where I want to listen to it. Same if I give a copy to someone else.

I wish more players would play flac!

Is it just me, or are there flaws to this rip? There are glitches throughout the recordings, for instance at 1.32 of Big in Japan (first track).

Hope it's something with my audio player or something.

PLEASE keep seeding, I've only got like 5% left to go
Thanks!
